verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhuke uthāñā kaila āliṅgana
galāgali kari' duṅhe karena krandana

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prabhuke—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; uthāñā—lifting up; kaila—did; āliṅgana—embracing; galāgali—shoulder to shoulder; kari'-doing; duṅhe—both of them; karena—do; krandana—crying.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Raṅga Purī lifted Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu up and embraced Him. As the two of them embraced shoulder to shoulder, they began to cry in ecstasy.
